attributes.action: Stop a Nuclear Holocaust in the Indian subcontinent!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
India and Pakistan have been engaged in a bitter conflict over the territory of Kashmir for more than 60 years now. They have waged 4 wars over this issue and are still engaged in low intensity skirmishes now and then. India has brutally slaughtered more than 120,000 innocent civilian Kashmiris seeking a right to self-determination as promised to them by India's first prime Minister J L Nehru.

We strongly urge the British Prime Minister to stop a Nuclear Holocaust in the sub-continent by effectively engaging both these countries and the Kashmiri people towards a just resolution of the Kashmir dispute
